full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,GRUB PA'I MTHA' RNAM PAR BZHAG PA 'KHRUL SPONG GDONG LNGA'I SGRA DBYANGS KUN MKHYEN LAM BZANG GSAL BA'I RIN CHEN SGRON ME ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS S+HO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @010A *, ,CES GRUB PA'I MTHA' RNAM PAR BZHAG PA 'KHRUL SPONG GDONG LNGA'I SGRA DBYANGS THAMS CAD MKHYEN PA'I LAM BZANG GSAL BA'I RIN CHEN SGRON ME ZHES BYA BA 'DI NI, SNGA MO NAS MANG THOS GSER KHAN CHOS RJE GU nA MTIS SNYAN TSIG ME TOG GSAR BAS BSKUL ZHING, ,DUS PHYIS YONGS KYI BSHES GNYEN CHEN PA MKHAS MCHOG LCANG RVA SLOB DPON PA 'PHAGS PA RIN CHEN GYIS KHAMS CHA? MDO NAS JA GA-YU KHA 'THAG GI RTEN BCAS NAS CHA BA SHOG TSIGS SU BCAD PA'I SGO NAS, ,STAG LO'I DGAG LAN 'JAM RGYAS DGOS ZHES BSKUL BA'I BKA' NGO DANG, ,KHYAD PAR RANG BLO GOMS PA'I SLAR DU MKHAN CHEN RGYAL BA THAMS CAD KYI BDAG PO RIN PO CHE LAS SDOM GSUM SOGS CHOS KYI BKA' DRIN THOB CING, ,'JAM DBYANGS BLA MA KHRI RIN PO CHE YAB SRAS PA NI DANG, ,PAn CHEN BKA' 'GYUR BA, RDO RJE 'CHANG SMIN GROL CHOS KYI RGYAL PO, ,SRE RDO RJE 'CHANG DANG SEMS DPA' CHEN PO NGAG DBANG BLO GROS SOGS DAM PA DU MA'I ZHABS RDUL SPYI BOS LEN CING, ,RJE BLA MA'I MDO SNGAGS RNAMS LA NGES SHES RNYED CING, ,'PHAGS BOD KYI GRUB MTHA'I GZUNG DANG, ,KHYAD PAR SHER SGRON, TSANG CHEN RTZA 'GREL, DUS 'KHOR SOGS GZHUNG LUGS CHEN PO RNAMS LA BRTEN GSUNG RAB DANG GRUB MTHA' RAB 'BYAMS SMRA BA 'JAM DBYANGS BZHAD PA'I RDO RJES TSIG NYUNG RGYAS 'GRIL DU, DKAR PO ZHES PA SA MO SPRUL GYI LO CHO 'PHRUL ZLA BA DKAR PHYOGS RDZOGS PA GSUM PA'I NYIN, GANGS CAN GYI BYA RGOD PHUNG PO GNYIS PA, DPA' BO MKHA' 'GRO'I 'DU GNAS RI BO DGE 'PHEL GYI GAR 'DUG THEG MCHOG ROL MCHOG GSANG SNGAGS BDE BA CHEN PO'I PHO BRANG NAS SBYAR BA LA, ,SLAR YANG 'PHRI BA SNON CUN ZAD BYAS PA 'DIS RGYAL BA'I BSTAN PA PHYOGS DUS THAMS CAD DU DAR ZHING RGYAS PAR GYUR CIG ,
